column4: oh my god this new GUI setup for 11.04 is hurting my brain.. how do I turn this mac-esque carebare deisgn off and go back to what it was in 10.04?
mac has the panel at the bottom
log off, select your name, then change the desktop you log in to at the bottom
yea, I have a panel too, that part I like.. the rest, my god.
